clinical_study.brief_title: A Pharmacokinetic Study of Sevoflurane Inhalation in Burn ICU Patients
clinical_study.official_title: A Pharmacokinetic Study of Sevoflurane Inhalation in Burn ICU Patients

brief_summary.textblock: Comparing a pharmacokinetic model of a short sevoflurane sedation in burn ICU patients with control ICU patients.

detailed_description.textblock: Prospective clinical study in ICU with sedated ventilated patients with sevoflurane with the AnaConda® system, establishing pharmacokinetic model of sevoflurane and its metabolites (hydroxyfluroisopropanol, fluoride) comparing burn and non burn ICU patients

clinical_study.study_design: Allocation: Non-Randomized, Endpoint Classification: Pharmacokinetics Study, Intervention Model: Parallel Assignment, Masking: Open Label, Primary Purpose: Treatment

primary_outcome.measure: Determination of plasmatic concentrations of sevoflurane
primary_outcome.time_frame: at 5min, 15 min, 60 min and just before the end of sedation.

secondary_outcome.measure: Determination of plasmatic concentrations of HFIP and fluoride
secondary_outcome.time_frame: at 5min, 15 min, 60 min and just before the end of sedation. And 5min, 10 min, 30 min, 60 min and 120 min after the end of sedation

clinical_study.condition: ICU Patients With Indication of Sedation

arm_group.description: Determination of plasmatic concentrations of sevoflurane at different times of a short term sedation of sevoflurane in burn versus non burn ICU patients
Determination of plasmatic concentrations of sevoflurane at different times of a short term sedation of sevoflurane in burn versus non burn ICU patients

intervention.intervention_name: Short term sedation with sevoflurane in ICU
intervention.other_name: Short term sedation with sevoflurane in ICU

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- Adult patients ventilated requiring invasive procedure in ICU
- Stable respiratory and hemodynamic conditions
- Consent of patients or family
- Arterial line
- Burn patients : burn area between 20 and 50% (3rd degree) OR non burn patients
Exclusion Criteria:
- BMI <30
- Sevoflurane anaphylaxia
